name: Math
description:
Bring the size to the desired size with mathematical operations and pass the section

How  to play: Movement with WASD or Arrow keys, 

Space: Freeze time and go to places you can't go using the light purple platform in the upper left corner. Drag and drop the platform

Platform Controls: Adjust size with mouse wheel, rotate with right click.

 Restart the partition with the 'R' key.
